description: A capacitive touch sensor with multiple inputs.

contents.name: touch
contents.description: Emitted when an input is touched.

contents.name: release
contents.description: Emitted when an input is no longer touched.

contents.name: tap
contents.description: Emitted when an input is briefly touched. TODO Not implemented.

contents.name: long_press
contents.description: Emitted when an input is touched for longer than 500ms. TODO Not implemented.

contents.name: swipe_pos
contents.description: Emitted when input channels are successively touched in order of increasing channel numbers.

contents.name: swipe_neg
contents.description: Emitted when input channels are successively touched in order of decreasing channel numbers.
